wheat: Wheat grows best in cool, dry climates with moderate rainfall. Ideal temperature is 10–25°C.
rice: Rice requires warm temperatures (20–30°C) and plenty of water. Grown in flooded fields.
corn: Corn needs full sun, well-drained soil, and moderate rainfall. Optimum temperature: 18–27°C.
sugarcane: Sugarcane grows well in tropical climates with high rainfall. Requires fertile soil and sunlight.
cotton: Cotton requires a long frost-free period, plenty of sunshine, and moderate rainfall.
millet: Millets grow in dry regions with low rainfall. They tolerate poor soils and high temperatures.
